name: Beat Rush!
description:
Can you survive to the end of the song?

*WARNING: LOUD BANGING MUSIC*

Arrow keys and WASD to move. Avoid the signals. You can wall jump.

I couldn't get the FX to show in WebGL so just enjoy the music.

Made in 72 hours for Minijam 125: Signal with Limatation Everything is tied to the Ryhthm. All assets are original created by me

https://twitter.com/poopdollargames
